feed.title: Immich Kiosk Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.16.3
entry.content:
Fixed an issue where dates would be lowercase when not in English.

What's Changed

‚ö° Fixes

  • date titlecase by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/309

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.16.2...v0.16.3

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.17.0
entry.content:
[!WARNING] Kiosk is transitioning from Docker Hub to GitHub (GHCR). Kindly update your image repository to ghcr.io/damongolding/immich-kiosk:latest.

Tags

Added tag support allowing users to filter displayed assets by Immich tags. Tags can be set via config.yaml, environment variables, or URL queries, with multiple tags supported for randomised asset selection.

Read the docs

Weather data location

Moved the weather location to the top right corner for all modes to maintain consistency.

What's Changed

üöÄ New Features

  • new asset bucket: tags by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/305

üî® Maintenance

  • Go bump and pnpm deps by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/304

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.16.3...v0.17.0

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.17.1
entry.content:
[!WARNING] Kiosk is transitioning from Docker Hub to GitHub (GHCR). Kindly update your image repository to ghcr.io/damongolding/immich-kiosk:latest.

Blur amount

Use background_blur_amount to increase or decreased the blur amount used on the blurred background.

Date range

Added today as a value e.g. http://{URL}?date=today

Layout Single

The layout: single now accepts image_effect: zoom without forcing image_fit: cover

What's Changed

üöÄ New Features

  • Feature/blur amount by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/317

‚ö° Fixes

  • fix for today_to_today by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/318

Other changes

  • 0.17.1 by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/319

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.17.0...v0.17.1

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.18.0
entry.content:
‚ö†Ô∏è Breaking Changes ‚ö†Ô∏è

Kiosk 0.18.0 doesn‚Äôt add new functionality, but it does introduce some breaking changes:

  • Kiosk has changed it's container image registry. Please update your image link to ghcr.io/damongolding/immich-kiosk:latest.
  • Immich version 1.127.0 is now required to continue supporting memories.

Date

The today variable is more reliable*

Example: url http://URL?date=today

*We have the Australian Sydney timezone to thank for this update.

New memories API endpoint

Updated memories to use the new pre-rendered memory endpoint.

Improved icon alignment

What do you mean you don't see a difference?!

What's Changed

‚ö° Fixes

  • Fix/date by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/323

üî® Maintenance

  • Chore/new memory endpoint by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/324

Other changes

  • cache datestamp by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/321

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.17.1...v0.18.0

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.19.0
entry.content:
like and hide buttons

Add two new buttons in the more info overlay.

Like button

The like button can be configured to set an asset as a favourite (the default), add it to the ‚ÄúKiosk Favorites‚Äù album, or both.

Like button docs

Hide button

The like hide can be configured to tag an asset with kiosk-skip (the default), archive the asset or both.

Hide button docs

date_filter

The date filter now supports albums.

Example: url http://URL?album=ALBUM_ID&date_filer=last-90-days

Read the docs

excluded_albums

The excluded albums feature now allows you to prevent specific album assets from being displayed in the slideshow.

Read the docs

excluded_people

This feature allows you to prevent specific people from being displayed in the slideshow.

[Read the docs](https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk?tab=readme-ov-file#exclude-people

Clock source

clock_source allows you to specify where the clock get the time from.

In most cases, using the default (client) setting will be preferred. However, if your client has low specifications, using the server‚Äôs time might provide more stability.

| Option | Description | |------------|----| | client (the default ) | Use the client/device (Javascript) | | server | Use the Kiosk server (API call) |

Redirect

The default type for redirects are now internal.

What's Changed

üöÄ New Features

  • extend date filter to albums by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/330
  • extend exclude albums to all sources by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/329
  • add image/ID endpoint by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/333
  • Feature/exclude people by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/334
  • made internal the default by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/338
  • add support for server clock by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/346
  • like and hide buttons by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/339

‚ö° Fixes

  • fix video range headers by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/347
  • only apply orientation fix to original images by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/348

üî® Maintenance

  • shared config by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/331
  • idiomatic code refactor by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/336
  • deps by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/340
  • deps by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/349

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.18.0...v0.19.0
